description: T(i,j) = bits of binary expansion of i interleaved with that of j.
comments: Inverse of sequence A054239 considered as a permutation of the nonnegative integers.Permutation of integers. Can be used as natural alternate number casting for pairs/tables (vs. usual diagonalization).Table T(n,k), read by antidiagonals, defined by T(n,k) = A000695(k) + 2*A000695(n). - _Philippe Deléham_, Oct 18 2011This array is a Z-order curve in an N x N grid. - _Max Barrentine_, Sep 24 2015
links: Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
crossrefs: See also A163357 and A163334 for other fractal curves in N x N grids.
author: _Marc LeBrun_, Feb 07 2000
